title: The tragidie of Ferrex and Porrex set forth without any addition or alteration but altogether as the same was shewed on stage before the Queenes Maiestie, about nine yeares past, vz. the xviij. day of Ianuarie. 1561. by the gentlemen of the Inner Temple. Seene and allowed. [et]c.
author: Norton, Thomas, 1532-1584.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Iohn Daye, dwelling ouer Aldersgate,
